text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco @senateGOP: WTF is wrong with this guy?!

Seriously: worst 3Q in HISTORY, Fellow Mask Denier Herman Cain dead from Covid19, and @POTUS is busy twitshilling for a pizza parlor
